forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West southwest wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle between 11pm and 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds with an inviting warmth, a crisp sun coaxing the temperature toward a pleasant zenith of sixty-five degrees. The gentle breeze from the west-southwest carries hints of salt and sun-dried earth, wrapping the city in a refreshing embrace. However, as twilight approaches, a trace of drizzle may grace the streets between the hours of eleven and five, though the likelihood is slight, punctuating the evening with a soft unpredictability. Clouds are just beginning to blanket the horizon, bringing an air of casual serenity to the skyline.

Visibility remains clear and expansive, with no fog appearing to hinder the view, while the marine layer lingers in the backdrop like a shy companion—present yet unobtrusive. A day such as this beckons for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a visit to one of the local parks, where laughter mingles with the vibrancy of life. As the sun begins its descent, embracing layers might be a wise choice; a light sweater or jacket could serve you well against the cool evening air. After all, in this uniquely mesmerizing city, even the mundane — like sipping coffee outdoor or engaging in casual conversation with friends — can transform into moments woven with magic.
